options.text: Do you know anyone else here?

speaker: Oliver Beebo
dialogue: (No, I shouldn't ask that. Wait, did I think it or say it?)

speaker: Oliver Beebo
dialogue: (Oh no, I said it. The alcohol got me)

speaker: Oliver Beebo
dialogue: (What's that supposed to mean. Is that a normal smile or a something else smile)

speaker: Oliver Beebo
dialogue: (How do I answer in a normal adult way?)

speaker: Oliver Beebo
dialogue: The concept of men has always intrigued me.
